G0.description: G0 is used to position the tool.  G0 is expected to be used when not using the tool, but firmware such as Marlin interprets G0 and G1 as the same command.

examples.explanation: Move 100 units on both the X and Y axis. The tool would move diagonally.

parameters.description: Move n units along the X axis.
Move N units along the Y axis.
Move N units along the X axis.
Move n units along the Z axis.
Set feedrate. Moves after this command will automatically use the specified feed rate.

G0.usage notes: G0 and G1 may be interpreted as the same command in some firmare.

G1.description: G1 is used to position the tool at a specific feed rate. The speed (feedrate) can be set with F*feedrate* and E *amount* amount of material can be extruded during the move. The firmware coordinates moves so that the feed rate for each axis and extruder is consistent and predictable. S can be used to check for endstops (S0: check, S1: ignore) but may not be implemented by your firmware.

examples.explanation: Move to 100,100 on the X and Y planes

parameters.description: Move n units along the X axis.
Move n units along the Y axis.
Move n units along the Z axis.
Set feedrate. Moves after this command will move at this rate (or slower).
S0 Ignore endstops, S1 Check for endstop. Disabling endstops may not be supported by some firmware.

G1.usage notes: G0 and G1 may be interpreted as the same command in some firmware.

examples.explanation: Move to 100,105 in a clockwise arc around 100, 100.

G2.format: G2 [X{POSITION} Y{POSITION} I{DISTANCE} J{DISTANCE} E{AMOUNT} F{FEEDRATE}]

parameters.description: Set feedrate. May be used alone to set a start and ending feed rate.

G2.usage notes: Move to the X,Y coordinates in an arc with a center of I,J.

examples.explanation: Move to 100,105 in a counter-clockwise arc around 100, 100.

G3.format: G3 [X{POSITION} Y{POSITION} I{DISTANCE} J{DISTANCE} E{AMOUNT} F{FEEDRATE}]

parameters.description: Set feedrate. May be used alone to set a start and ending feed rate.

G3.usage notes: Move to the X,Y coordinates in an arc with a center of I,J.

G4.description: Wait for a specific amount of time before continuing.
G4.usage notes: Both S and P may not be implemented by your firmware.
